name: SamurA.I
description:
Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
LMB - Dash Attack
Space - Continue Dialogue

Click here for optional backstory.

Assets:
One Stock Asset from Adobe Stock.
Made for Wowie Jam 4.
Topic: "Collaborate With A.I.".
We decided to make the collaboration with an A.I. both in a gameplay and narrative sense. A character who is an A.I. controlled robot named SAM is controlled by the computer to assist the player for an extravagant combo attack.
